doctor.name: Dr. Md. Kabir Hasan Parvez
doctor.specialty: Psychiatry (Mental Illness, Addiction & Sexual Medicine) Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Kabir Hasan Parvez is a Psychiatrist in Mymensingh. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Psychiatry), MACP (USA). He is a Assistant Professor & Head, Psychiatry at Mymensingh Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Pranto Diagnostic Center, Mymensingh. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Kabir Hasan Parvez at Pranto Diagnostic Center, Mymensingh is 2.30pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Bidhan Ranjan Roy Poddar
doctor.specialty: Mental Health, Drug Addiction & Sexual Diseases Specialist
doctor.workplace: National Institute of Mental Health & Hospital
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Bidhan Ranjan Roy Poddar is a Psychiatrist in Mymensingh. His qualification is MBBS, DPM, MPhil (Psychiatry). He is the Director cum Professor, Psychiatry at National Institute of Mental Health & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Union Specialized Hospital, Mymensingh. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Bidhan Ranjan Roy Poddar at Union Specialized Hospital, Mymensingh is 10am to 4pm (Friday & Saturday).

doctor.name: Dr. M. Asraful Siddike Pathan
doctor.specialty: Mental Health, Drug Addiction & Sexual Diseases Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. M. Asraful Siddike Pathan is a Psychiatrist in Mymensingh. His qualification is MBBS, MPhil (Psychiatry). He is a Associate Professor & Head, Psychiatry at Community Based Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Union Specialized Hospital, Mymensingh. Practicing hour of Dr. M. Asraful Siddike Pathan at Union Specialized Hospital, Mymensingh is Sat to Thu (Closed: Sunday).

doctor.name: Dr. Dil Md. Sazzadul Kabir (Sabuz)
doctor.specialty: Mental Diseases, Drug Addiction & Sexual Medicine Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Dil Md. Sazzadul Kabir (Sabuz) is a Psychiatrist in Mymensingh. His qualification is MBBS (Dhaka), BCS (Health), MD (Psychiatry). He is a Registrar, Psychiatry at Mymensingh Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Sodesh Hospital, Mymensingh. Practicing hour of Dr. Dil Md. Sazzadul Kabir (Sabuz) at Sodesh Hospital, Mymensingh is 3pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).
